main event: Two young ladies sighted a bright object in the sky for the first time on 23 December 1962.
interesting points: The object was much brighter than a star and appeared small,The sighting occurred at 0230 o'clock on a bright, clear night while facing east,The object was observed moving from N.W. to S.E. at a slow pace,It displayed intentional movements, including reversing direction,The conclusions drawn suggested the object could be a balloon or aircraft, but it is possibly related to Venus.
witness description: young ladies sighting the object for the first time
